query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Quel color che viltà di fuor mi pinse 2 veggendo il duca mio tornare in volta, 3 più tosto dentro il suo novo ristrinse.
query.error: **English:** 1 That color which fear of death painted on my face 2 when I saw my leader turn back, 3 he restrained within his new resolve.
query.result: 1 Saḥ varṇaḥ yaḥ mṛtyubhayāt mama mukham alimpa, 2 dṛṣṭvā mama netāram punar āvarttamānam, 3 ātmīyam saṅkalpam adhikam saṅkocitaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 Attento si fermò com’ uom ch’ascolta; 5 ché l’occhio nol potea menare a lunga 6 per l’aere nero e per la nebbia folta.
query.error: **English:** 4 He stopped attentively, like a man listening; 5 for his eyes could not see far ahead 6 through the dark air and the thick fog.
query.result: 4 Saḥ śravaṇavat puruṣa iva tiṣṭhati sma, 5 cakṣuṣā hi sa dūre na nayitum śaknoti sma, 6 kṛṣṇavāyau saha ghanena kuhareṇa ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 «Pur a noi converrà vincer la punga», 8 cominciò el, «se non . . . Tal ne s’offerse. 9 Oh quanto tarda a me ch’altri qui giunga!».
query.error: **English:** 7 "We too must conquer the struggle," 8 he began, "if not . . ." That's how he offered himself. 9 Oh, how I long for someone else to arrive here!
query.result: 7 "Asmabhyaḥ api vijetum āvaśyakam eṣā pṛthakkaraṇapraśnaḥ," 8 ārabhata saḥ, "yadi na . . ." Tathā sa ātmānam arpayām āsa. 9 Ahaṃ katham icchāmi anyam atra āgacchatīti!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 I’ vidi ben sì com’ ei ricoperse 11 lo cominciar con l’altro che poi venne, 12 che fur parole a le prime diverse;
query.error: **English:** 10 I saw very well how he covered up 11 the beginning with the other that came after, 12 which were words different from the first;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 ma nondimen paura il suo dir dienne, 14 perch’ io traeva la parola tronca 15 forse a peggior sentenzia che non tenne.
query.error: **English:** 13 but nevertheless his speech caused me fear, 14 because I drew from the interrupted speech 15 perhaps a worse meaning than it held.
query.result: 13 Tathāpi bhayam mayi jātam tasya kathanaṃ, 14 yataḥ aham ākarṣam khaṇḍitām vācam 15 kimcid adhikāṃ śāsanāpekṣayā yā na āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 «In questo fondo de la trista conca 17 discende mai alcun del primo grado, 18 che sol per pena ha la speranza cionca?».
query.error: **English:** 16 "Into this depth of the dismal pit 17 does anyone ever descend from the first circle, 18 who has only lost hope as punishment?".
query.result: 16 "Asmin trista-koṭarasya tale 17 prathama-bhūmeḥ kaścid avaruhyate kadācit, 18 yasya kevalam daṇḍaḥ āśā-śūnyaḥ?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Questa question fec’ io; e quei «Di rado 20 incontra», mi rispuose, «che di noi 21 faccia il cammino alcun per qual io vado.
query.error: **English:** 19 This question I asked; and he replied to me, "Rarely 20 does anyone travel our road, 21 for the path I take is difficult."
query.result: 19 Etāṃ pṛcchāṃ cakāra aham; sa ca "Duraṃ", me pratyāha, "yaḥ kaścid asmākam 20 mārgaṃ karoti yena aham gacchāmi. 21 Duḥkhaṃ hi mārgaḥ ayam mama."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Ver è ch’altra fïata qua giù fui, 23 congiurato da quella Eritón cruda 24 che richiamava l’ombre a’ corpi sui.
query.error: **English:** 22 It is true that I was here below another time, 23 conjured by that cruel Erichtho, 24 who called back shades to their bodies.
query.result: 22 Satyamasti yadanyatrapi pūrvam adhastād abhūvam, 23 sammohitaḥ tayā krūrāyā Eritoḥ, 24 yā chāyāḥ punar āhvayati sva-śarīreṣu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Di poco era di me la carne nuda, 26 ch’ella mi fece intrar dentr’ a quel muro, 27 per trarne un spirto del cerchio di Giuda.
query.error: **English:** 25 My flesh was recently stripped bare, 26 which made me enter within that wall, 27 to extract a spirit from the circle of Judas.
query.result: 25 Alpameva samabhavat mama māṃsam nagnam, 26 Yat tena mayā praveṣṭaḥ sa prākāraḥ, 27 Yataḥ ekaḥ ātmā uddhṛtaḥ Yudasya maṇḍalāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Quell’ è ’l più basso loco e ’l più oscuro, 29 e ’l più lontan dal ciel che tutto gira: 30 ben so ’l cammin; però ti fa sicuro.
query.error: **English:** 28 That is the lowest and darkest place, 29 and the farthest from the heavens that turn everything: 30 I know the way well; therefore, be assured.
query.result: 28 Saḥ eva nīcaḥ sthānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca, 29 Diśām api sarvāṇāṃ dūratamaḥ: 30 Suparijñātaḥ me ayam mārgaḥ; tasmāt niścitaḥ bhava.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Questa palude che ’l gran puzzo spira 32 cigne dintorno la città dolente, 33 u’ non potemo intrare omai sanz’ ira».
query.error: **English:** 31 This marsh, which exhales the great stench, 32 encircles the woeful city, 33 where we could not enter now without wrath.
query.result: 31 Ayam palvalaḥ yaḥ mahatīm gandham udvamatē, 32 cignāḥ paritaḥ duḥkhitām purīm, 33 yatra na śaknāmaḥ praveśitum adhunā krodhena vinā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 E altro disse, ma non l’ho a mente; 35 però che l’occhio m’avea tutto tratto 36 ver’ l’alta torre a la cima rovente,
query.error: **English:** 34 And another thing he said, but I don't remember it; 35 but my eyes had drawn me completely 36 toward the lofty tower with its fiery summit,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 dove in un punto furon dritte ratto 38 tre furïe infernal di sangue tinte, 39 che membra feminine avieno e atto,
query.error: **English:** 37 where suddenly, in an instant, there stood upright 38 three infernal Furies, steeped in blood, 39 who had the limbs andの姿 of women,
query.result: 37 yatra ekasmin kṣaṇe samāgatāḥ āsan kṣipram 38 trayo narakīya-krodhāḥ rakta-raktāḥ, 39 ye strī-śarīrāṇi ca veṣāṇi ca āsīt,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 e con idre verdissime eran cinte; 41 serpentelli e ceraste avien per crine, 42 onde le fiere tempie erano avvinte.
query.error: **English:** 40 and they were girt with verdant hydras; 41 they had little snakes and horned vipers for hair, 42 which entwined their fierce temples.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 E quei, che ben conobbe le meschine 44 de la regina de l’etterno pianto, 45 «Guarda», mi disse, «le feroci Erine.
query.error: **English:** 43 And he, who knew well the wretched ones 44 of the queen of eternal weeping, 45 "Look," he said to me, "at the fierce Erinyes.
query.result: 43 Sa ca, yaḥ suparijñāḥ āsīt duritātmānaḥ 44 nityaduḥkhasya rājñyāḥ, 45 "Paśya," iti mama avocat, "ughrāḥ ṛṇayaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 Con l’unghie si fendea ciascuna il petto; 50 battiensi a palme e gridavan sì alto, 51 ch’i’ mi strinsi al poeta per sospetto.
query.error: **English:** 49 With their nails they tore at their chests; 50 they beat their palms and cried out so loudly, 51 that I clung to the poet in fear.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
52 «Vegna Medusa: sì ’l farem di smalto», 53 dicevan tutte riguardando in giuso; 54 «mal non vengiammo in Tesëo l’assalto».
query.error: **English:** 52 "Bring on Medusa, so we'll turn him to stone," 53 they all said, looking down; 54 "we didn't avenge ourselves badly on Theseus's attack."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
55 «Volgiti ’n dietro e tien lo viso chiuso; 56 ché se ’l Gorgón si mostra e tu ’l vedessi, 57 nulla sarebbe di tornar mai suso».
query.error: **English:** 55 "Turn back and keep your eyes closed; 56 for if the Gorgon shows herself and you see her, 57 there would be no way to return above."
query.result: 55 Pratyāvartasva, nidhāya ca cakṣuṣī, 56 yadi hi gorgon darśayati ātmānam, tvam ca paśyasi tam, 57 na syāt kadācid api punar ārohaṇam ūrdhvam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
58 Così disse ’l maestro; ed elli stessi 59 mi volse, e non si tenne a le mie mani, 60 che con le sue ancor non mi chiudessi.
query.error: **English:** 58 Thus spoke the master; and he himself 59 turned me, and did not hold back from my hands, 60 so that with his own he might still close me in.
query.result: 58 Evam uvāca guruḥ; sa ca svayam 59 Mām avavarta, na ca svakaraṇayoḥ nirodhaḥ āsīt, 60 Yathā svakaraṇābhyām eva mama āvaraṇam api kuryāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
61 O voi ch’avete li ’ntelletti sani, 62 mirate la dottrina che s’asconde 63 sotto ’l velame de li versi strani.
query.error: **English:** 61 O you who have sound intellects, 62 consider the doctrine that is hidden 63 beneath the veil of the strange verses.
query.result: 61 He ye ye prajñāvantaḥ santi, 62 paśyata tattvam yat nihitam asti 63 ācchādane viचित्रश्लोकानाम्.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
64 E già venìa su per le torbide onde 65 un fracasso d’un suon, pien di spavento, 66 per cui tremavano amendue le sponde,
query.error: **English:** 64 And now there came over the troubled waves 65 a crashing sound, full of terror, 66 at which both banks trembled,
query.result: 64 Ata eva āgacchat upari kṣubhita-taraṅgāṇām 65 Ekaḥ śabdaḥ śabdasya, pūrṇaḥ bhayena, 66 Yena kampante sma ubhe api tīre,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
67 non altrimenti fatto che d’un vento 68 impetüoso per li avversi ardori, 69 che fier la selva e sanz’ alcun rattento
query.error: **English:** 67 made no differently than by a wind 68 rushing violently through opposing heat, 69 which strikes the forest and without any restraint
query.result: 67 Na anyathā kṛtaḥ yathā vātena 68 Vega-vatā prati-uṣṇa-tāpān, 69 Yaḥ hanti vanaṃ ca apratihataḥ

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
70 li rami schianta, abbatte e porta fori; 71 dinanzi polveroso va superbo, 72 e fa fuggir le fiere e li pastori.
query.error: **English:** 70 breaks, fells, and carries away the branches; 71 it goes proudly in front, raising dust, 72 and makes the wild beasts and shepherds flee.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
73 Li occhi mi sciolse e disse: «Or drizza il nerbo 74 del viso su per quella schiuma antica 75 per indi ove quel fummo è più acerbo».
query.error: **English:** 73 He unsealed my eyes and said: "Now strengthen the sinew 74 of your gaze up over that ancient foam 75 toward where that smoke is most acrid."
query.result: 73 Saḥ mama netrāni vimuktavantaḥ uvāca ca: "Idānīm dṛḍhaya dṛṣṭeḥ balam 74 mukhena upari tasyāḥ pūrvasyāḥ phenarāśeḥ 75 tatra yatra saḥ dhūmaḥ ati-tīkṣṇaḥ asti."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
76 Come le rane innanzi a la nimica 77 biscia per l’acqua si dileguan tutte, 78 fin ch’a la terra ciascuna s’abbica,
query.error: **English:** 76 Like frogs before their enemy, the snake, 77 all scatter through the water, 78 until each one squats on the ground,
query.result: 76 Yathā mandūkāḥ śatrūnāgāt 77 Jale viśikṣipya sarve palāyante, 78 Yāvat pṛthivyām ekaikaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
79 vid’ io più di mille anime distrutte 80 fuggir così dinanzi ad un ch’al passo 81 passava Stige con le piante asciutte.
query.error: **English:** 79 I saw more than a thousand ruined souls 80 fleeing in the same way before one 81 who crossed the Styx with dry feet.
query.result: 79 Tathāham adhikān sahasram ātmānaḥ 80 Naṣṭān paśyāmi evam eva palāyamānān 81 Yena Styam śuṣkapādābhyām atītaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
82 Dal volto rimovea quell’ aere grasso, 83 menando la sinistra innanzi spesso; 84 e sol di quell’ angoscia parea lasso.
query.error: **English:** 82 From his face he removed that foul air, 83 often moving his left hand in front; 84 and he seemed weary only from that anguish.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
85 Ben m’accorsi ch’elli era da ciel messo, 86 e volsimi al maestro; e quei fé segno 87 ch’i’ stessi queto ed inchinassi ad esso.
query.error: **English:** 85 I realized well that he was sent from heaven, 86 and I turned to the master; and he made a sign 87 that I should be quiet and bow down to him.
query.result: 85 Suṣṭhu manye tam divyap्रेषितमेव, 86 Tataś ca ācāryam abhyavarttata; sa ca ācāryaḥ saṃjñām akārṣīt 87 Yathā aham śāntaḥ syām tatraiva ca namaskriyām kuryām.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
88 Ahi quanto mi parea pien di disdegno! 89 Venne a la porta e con una verghetta 90 l’aperse, che non v’ebbe alcun ritegno.
query.error: **English:** 88 Ah, how full of disdain he seemed to me! 89 He came to the door and with a little rod 90 he opened it, for there was no resistance.
query.result: 88 Aha, katham mām adhikṛtya nirviṇṇa iva ābhāt! 89 Saḥ dvāram upajagāma, ekaṃ daṇḍakam ca gṛhītvā 90 tad udghāṭayām āsa, na ca tasya kaścid virodhaḥ āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
91 «O cacciati del ciel, gente dispetta», 92 cominciò elli in su l’orribil soglia, 93 «ond’ esta oltracotanza in voi s’alletta?
query.error: **English:** 91 "O you who were cast out of Heaven, despised people," 92 he began on the horrible threshold, 93 "where does this arrogance in you arise?
query.result: 91 "He viṣṇujana nirākṛtāḥ", 92 sa uvāca ghoraṃ śikṣādvāram āruhya, 93 "katham eṣā garvamātmāsu vṛddhā?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
94 Perché recalcitrate a quella voglia 95 a cui non puote il fin mai esser mozzo, 96 e che più volte v’ha cresciuta doglia?
query.error: **English:** 94 Why do you rebel against that will 95 whose end can never be cut off, 96 and which has increased your suffering many times over?
query.result: 94 Kimartham pratikūlā bhavatha tasmai icchāya, 95 yasya antaḥ kathañcid api na śakyate chinditum, 96 yaś ca punaḥ punaḥ adhikam duḥkham vardhayati?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
97 Che giova ne le fata dar di cozzo? 98 Cerbero vostro, se ben vi ricorda, 99 ne porta ancor pelato il mento e ’l gozzo».
query.error: **English:** 97 What good does it do to struggle against fate? 98 Your Cerberus, if you remember correctly, 99 still carries his chin and throat peeled from it."
query.result: 97 Kim prayojanam vidhātau pratihatam dadhātum? 98 Bhavatām Cerberus, yadi samyak smaryate, 99 adhunāpi chinnahanuḥ kaṇṭhaś ca vartate."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
100 Poi si rivolse per la strada lorda, 101 e non fé motto a noi, ma fé sembiante 102 d’omo cui altra cura stringa e morda
query.error: **English:** 100 Then he turned back along the foul road, 101 and said not a word to us, but made a gesture 102 of one whom some other care constrains and goads,
query.result: 100 Tataḥ sa palāyitaḥ durgeṇa mārgeṇa, 101 na ca asmābhiḥ saha ekaṃ vākyam abhāṣata, kintu cakāra āṅgikam 102 tasya puruṣasya yena anyāpi vyākulatā baddhā bhavatīti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
103 che quella di colui che li è davante; 104 e noi movemmo i piedi inver’ la terra, 105 sicuri appresso le parole sante.
query.error: **English:** 103 than that of him who is in front of him; 104 and we moved our feet toward the land, 105 secure after the holy words.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
106 Dentro li ’ntrammo sanz’ alcuna guerra; 107 e io, ch’avea di riguardar disio 108 la condizion che tal fortezza serra,
query.error: **English:** 106 We entered there without any struggle; 107 and I, who had a desire to look 108 at the condition which such a fortress encloses,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 com’ io fui dentro, l’occhio intorno invio: 110 e veggio ad ogne man grande campagna, 111 piena di duolo e di tormento rio.
query.error: **English:** 109 as soon as I was inside, sent my eyes around: 110 and I see on every hand a great plain, 111 full of sorrow and of grievous torment.
query.result: 109 yadā aham antra āgato 'bhavam, cakṣuḥ sarvataḥ praṣṭhāpayāmi: 110 paśyāmi ca sarvatra mahān maṇḍalaḥ, 111 duḥkhena paripūrṇaḥ ca ghoreṇa kleśena ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
112 Sì come ad Arli, ove Rodano stagna, 113 sì com’ a Pola, presso del Carnaro 114 ch’Italia chiude e suoi termini bagna,
query.error: **English:** 112 Just as at Arles, where the Rhone becomes stagnant, 113 and as at Pola, near the Carnaro, 114 which closes Italy and bathes its borders,
query.result: 112 Yathā Arli, yatra Rodanaḥ sthāvaraḥ asti, 113 Tathā yathā Pola, Carnāra-samipe, 114 Yaḥ Itāliyāṃ niravayati tasya ca sīmān abhiṣiñcati,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
115 fanno i sepulcri tutt’ il loco varo, 116 così facevan quivi d’ogne parte, 117 salvo che ’l modo v’era più amaro;
query.error: **English:** 115 the sepulchers make the whole place uneven, 116 so they did here on every side, 117 except that the manner there was more bitter;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
118 ché tra li avelli fiamme erano sparte, 119 per le quali eran sì del tutto accesi, 120 che ferro più non chiede verun’ arte.
query.error: **English:** 118 for flames were spread among the tombs, 119 by which they were so completely kindled, 120 that no art demands hotter iron.
query.result: 118 Yataḥ samādhīnāṃ madhye jvālāḥ vikīrṇāḥ āsīt, 119 Yābhiḥ te samyak sarvatra dagdhāḥ āsīt, 120 Yathā lauhaṃ adhika-uṣṇaṃ na kaścit kalā apaiti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
121 Tutti li lor coperchi eran sospesi, 122 e fuor n’uscivan sì duri lamenti, 123 che ben parean di miseri e d’offesi.
query.error: **English:** 121 All their coverings were suspended, 122 and from them issued such harsh laments, 123 that they clearly seemed to be from the wretched and the offended.
query.result: 121 Sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ āvaraṇāni āśliṣṭāni āsīt, 122 tataś ca niryāyanti sma tādrśāni kaṭukāni vilāpāni, 123 yāni duḥkhitānāṃ eva alaṅkṛtānāṃ ca abhūt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
124 E io: «Maestro, quai son quelle genti 125 che, seppellite dentro da quell’ arche, 126 si fan sentir coi sospiri dolenti?».
query.error: **English:** 124 And I: "Master, who are those people 125 who, buried inside those tombs, 126 make themselves heard with their sorrowful sighs?".
query.result: 124 Aham ca: "Ācārya, ke nāma ete janāḥ 125 ye, samāhitāḥ antaḥ tāsu śayyāsu, 126 śrāvayanti ātmanam duḥkha-niḥśvāsaiḥ?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
127 E quelli a me: «Qui son li eresïarche 128 con lor seguaci, d’ogne setta, e molto 129 più che non credi son le tombe carche.
query.error: **English:** 127 And those to me: "Here are the heretics 128 with their followers, of every sect, and much 129 more than you believe are the tombs laden."
query.result: 127 Te ca mama: "Atra santi mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ 128 Saha anugāminībhiḥ, sarvasampradāyeṣu, ca bahu 129 Yat tvam na manyase, tāvatāpi pūrṇāḥ santi samādhayaḥ."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
130 Simile qui con simile è sepolto, 131 e i monimenti son più e men caldi». 132 E poi ch’a la man destra si fu vòlto,
query.error: **English:** 130 Here is entombed with kindred, kindred dust, 131 And fame is shallow in the scales of time. 132 And now, when he had turned to the right hand,
query.result: 130 Iha sārdham sārdham jātyā saha samāhitaḥ, 131 Smṛtayaśca adhikaḥalpaḥ adhikaḥalpaśca kālasya tulāyāṃ. 132 Tataśca dakṣiṇe haste yaḥ pravṛttaḥ āsīt,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
133 passammo tra i martìri e li alti spaldi.
query.error: **English:** 133 We passed between the tortured and the lofty walls.
query.result: 133 Vyadhītāḥ udgatāḥ prākārāḥ asmābhiḥ atītaḥ.
